restore-card-catalog.name: Restore the Card Catalog System
restore-card-catalog.description: The ancient wooden drawers are stuck and labels have faded. Organize and restore this system of knowledge.
restore-card-catalog.completionPrompt: Read a non-fiction book and create an index card entry for it with key facts.

repair-reading-desks.name: Repair the Reading Desks
repair-reading-desks.description: Sturdy oak desks where scholars once studied. They need polish, reinforcement, and care.
repair-reading-desks.completionPrompt: Annotate or take notes on the next book you read.

polish-globe-collection.name: Polish the Globe Collection
polish-globe-collection.description: Antique globes showing worlds both real and imagined. Each needs cleaning and repair.
polish-globe-collection.completionPrompt: Read a book that contains a map.

restore-stained-glass.name: Restore the Stained Glass Windows
restore-stained-glass.description: Beautiful scenes of love and connection, now cracked and dusty. Each pane tells a romantic story.
restore-stained-glass.completionPrompt: Read a book about something broken being transformed into something even more beautiful.

refinish-dance-floor.name: Refinish the Dance Floor
refinish-dance-floor.description: The parquet needs sanding, staining, and sealing. Make it shine again for future waltzes.
refinish-dance-floor.completionPrompt: Read a book set in an iconic era (1920s, Victorian, Regency, Ancient Egypt, etc.).

repair-tea-service.name: Repair the Tea Service
repair-tea-service.description: Delicate china, silver spoons, and a porcelain teapot. Perfect for intimate conversations.
repair-tea-service.completionPrompt: Read a cozy book in a comfortable setting.

calibrate-orrery.name: Calibrate the Orrery
calibrate-orrery.description: A mechanical model of celestial movements. Its gears have frozen and need realignment.
calibrate-orrery.completionPrompt: Read a book where you've seen another adaptation (movie, TV show, play, etc.).

restore-telescope-array.name: Restore the Telescope Array
restore-telescope-array.description: Multiple telescopes of varying sizes, all pointed at impossible stars. They need cleaning and focusing.
restore-telescope-array.completionPrompt: Read a book with stars on the cover.

repair-computing-engine.name: Repair the Computing Engine
repair-computing-engine.description: A sophisticated analytical engine that processes complex calculations and predictions. It needs a power source.
repair-computing-engine.completionPrompt: Read a new release (published this year).

revitalize-fairy-circle.name: Revitalize the Fairy Circle
revitalize-fairy-circle.description: Mushrooms have withered and the magical resonance has faded. The fae need their gateway restored.
revitalize-fairy-circle.completionPrompt: Read a book with a circle on the cover.

restore-potion-laboratory.name: Restore the Potion Laboratory
restore-potion-laboratory.description: Alembics, cauldrons, and ingredient jarsâ€”all need organization and magical cleansing.
restore-potion-laboratory.completionPrompt: Read a book that has witchy vibes or mystical iconography on the cover.

repair-crystal-chandeliers.name: Repair the Crystal Chandeliers
repair-crystal-chandeliers.description: Massive chandeliers made of enchanted crystal that refract magical light.
repair-crystal-chandeliers.completionPrompt: Read an epic fantasy or high fantasy book.

seal-cursed-vault.name: Seal the Cursed Vault
seal-cursed-vault.description: Dark magic seeps from the vault doors. Proper wards and seals are needed.
seal-cursed-vault.completionPrompt: Read a book featuring curses or dark magic.

cleanse-darkened-halls.name: Cleanse the Darkened Halls
cleanse-darkened-halls.description: Shadows cling too thickly here. Light and purification rituals are needed.
cleanse-darkened-halls.completionPrompt: Read a book that has a silhouette on the cover.

restore-protective-wards.name: Restore the Protective Wards
restore-protective-wards.description: Ancient symbols carved into doorframes and windowsills need to be retraced and empowered.
restore-protective-wards.completionPrompt: Read a book where characters protect themselves or others from danger.

restore-grand-entrance.name: Restore the Grand Entrance
restore-grand-entrance.description: The grand double doors and welcome mat need attention. First impressions matter.
restore-grand-entrance.completionPrompt: Read the first book in a new-to-you series or by a new-to-you author.

repair-front-desk.name: Repair the Front Desk
repair-front-desk.description: Where books are checked in and out. The desk needs refinishing and organization.
repair-front-desk.completionPrompt: Read a book by a marginalized or BIPOC author.

create-cozy-nooks.name: Create Cozy Reading Nooks
create-cozy-nooks.description: Comfortable chairs, good lighting, and spaces designed for getting lost in stories.
create-cozy-nooks.completionPrompt: Read a book in an especially comfortable or cozy location.

restore-main-catalog.name: Restore the Main Card Catalog
restore-main-catalog.description: The central organizational system for the entire library. Massive and crucial.
restore-main-catalog.completionPrompt: Read a book from a popular reading list or book club.

polish-grand-chandelier.name: Polish the Grand Chandelier
polish-grand-chandelier.description: A stunning centerpiece that lights the heart of the library. Each crystal must sparkle.
polish-grand-chandelier.completionPrompt: Read a classic or award-winning book.
